DOC.detailed_description: A rapid accurate measurement glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) important acute kidney injury ( AKI ) chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) assessment impairment , diagnosis , prompt treatment . FAST BioMedical emerge technology company whose mission quantify clinically mean ful physiological parameter difficult impossible measure . GFR clinically relevant metric understand renal function , rate kidney able filter waste product bloodstream . The FAST mGFR direct measurement GFR rely read ratio fluorescent marker attach different size dextran molecule introduce bloodstream . The test intend adjunct current method utilized assess kidney function .

Ages 19 75 Subject 's screening must fall one available category estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) renal function : : ≥ 60 mL/min stage normal function ; 3059 mL/min stage 3 , moderate CKD ; 1529 mL/min stage 4 , severe CKD , Patients must inotropes vasopressor , must absent significant hemodynamic instability . Patients must cease use follow : nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug 6 day prior , herbal supplement 6 day prior test cimetidine trimethoprim 14 day prior test . Ability comply study condition Inclusion Criteria Group 4 : Female subject ; woman must negative urine pregnancy test screen dose Visit 2 either confirm Investigator infertile use reliable method contraception . Male subject : reproductively active men must agree either practice abstinence utilize adequate contraception . Patients must without evidence clinically significant liver dysfunction Ability comply study condition Exclusion Criteria Groups 13 : Positive history clinically significant allergic negative reaction , side effect , anaphylaxis sulfa , iodine , dye , shellfish , isotope dextran molecule Previous history nephrectomy kidney transplant A body weight 40kg A body mass index < 17 > 40 Subjects use Coumadin ( Warfarin ) INR > 4 Screening predose Visit 2 Past history liver disease screen Liver Function test exceed 1.5 time upper limit normal albumin < 2mg/dl . Clinically significant illness within 4 week clinically significant infection within 4 week screen Received blood , donate blood , clinically significant ongoing bleeding , change haemoglobin , experience significant blood loss within 2 week dose Subjects significant abnormal finding upon physical examination , vital sign , ECG , clinical laboratory result Screening Subjects supine blood pressure rest least 5 minute outside 90145 ( systolic ) mmHg 5095 mmHg ( diastolic ) range Subjects supine ( ECG ) heart rate outside 45105 beats/min rest least 5 minute . Subjects know suspected history drug alcohol misuse within 6 month prior screen , subject consume alcohol within 48 hour dose , subject Investigator believe unfit participate study due abuse illegal control substance . Subjects positive result Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C virus antibody ( HCVAb ) screen . Subjects diagnose acquire immune deficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) , test positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) .
